name: Rocket Time | Unity
description:
Rocket Time

A simple and fun game. Take the rocket to the highest point by taping at the right time.

TRY GAME

Features

  • Addictive one-touch gameplay
  • Ready to publish
  • High-quality code
  • Attractive graphics
  • Multiple levels and rockets
  • Easy to customize
  • Publish to Android/iOS/Web/Desktop
  • Response design
  • Optimized for mobile
  • Free-to-use assets
  • Integrated with Admob ads
  • One IAP to disable ads
  • Remote configuration to enable/disable banner ads
  • Setup documentation to help you build the game

Download folder has

  • Unity project
  • Setup documentation

Requirements

  • Unity editor version 2020.3.15f2
  • Winrar to export the source file

Watch trailer

For any support, you may reach out to us at our Discord channel or write to contact@shepherd.games
